name: KTBO
description: Kontrabando (KTBO) is a multi-disciplinary creative agency founded in 2007 in Mexico City. Current clientes include The Coca-Cola Company, DIAGEO Group, Mondelēz, Kellogg’s, Nestlé, Henkel, Grupo Walmart, Grupo Gigante and others. They specialise in the design and implementation of content strategies across platforms to help drive value to their brands.
